title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Buildings, and Exhibition space in thousand square feet in each Buildings on the y axis.
The Exhibition space in thousand square feet is highest at Buildings Enercare Centre and lowest at Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre.
The highest value at Buildings Enercare Centre is 3.21x times more than the lowest value at Vancouver Convention Centre.

Buildings Enercare Centre has the highest Exhibition space in thousand square feet and Vancouver Convention Centre has the lowest Exhibition space in thousand square feet.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Buildings, and Exhibition space in thousand square feet in each Buildings on the y axis.
The Exhibition space in thousand square feet is appeared to be the highest at Buildings Enercare Centre and lowest at Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre.
The second highest Exhibition space in thousand square feet is appeared to be the Buildings The Toronto Congress Centre.
The difference of Exhibition space in thousand square feet between the highest and lowest Buildings is 688.5.

The Buildings Enercare Centre has the highest Exhibition space in thousand square feet, followed by The Toronto Congress Centre, and The International Centre Toronto. Down to the Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre which is the lowest.
Buildings Enercare Centre, and The Toronto Congress Centre have the same Exhibition space in thousand square feet.
The Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre tends to be 1.9 percent lower than average.
